titleStmt.title: A proclamation against all persons who have intrometted with the goods of forefaulted rebels and traitors, &c.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)
James II, King of England, 1633-1701.

publicationStmt.publisher: Edinburgh printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson ; this may be reprinted at London August the 21th for J.C.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
"Given under our signet at Edinburgh, the eleventh day of August, 1685. And of our reign the first year."
